definitions: in a manner that shows deep religious feeling or commitment

examples.text: they passed a man praying devoutly beside a roadside shrine

shortDefinitions: having or showing deep religious feeling or commitment

definitions: in a totally committed and sincere way; earnestly

examples.text: let us devoutly hope that Morris is correct
he devoutly believes that he is rescuing these children

shortDefinitions: in totally committed and sincere way
